headline: UBS Reduces PT on McCormick & Company (MKC) Stock
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC) is one of the Best FMCG Stocks to Invest In According to Analysts. On January 23, UBS analyst Bryan Adams reduced its price objective on the company’s stock to $67 from $70, while keeping a “Neutral” rating, as reported by The Fly. As per the analyst, McCormick & Company, Incorporated (NYSE:MKC)’s Q4 2025 EPS […]
